about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hi, I'm Daniel, a Frontend developer from Tel Aviv. Since 2021 I've been building different web applications for e-commerce, construction, fintech, healthcare, and startup products. I like to focus on clean UI, predictable behavior, and maintainable architecture.
about.background: Before moving into web development, I spent over 15 years in business operations, so I can value ownership, clarity, and building solutions that make sense for real users and business goals, and not just code that "works".
focus: Developing frontend applications with React and TypeScript
Writing clear, maintainable UI code and reusable components
Working with API-driven applications and basic backend integration
Improving existing code through debugging, refactoring, and pragmatic testing
about.stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, AWS
howIWork: I take ownership of frontend features end-to-end and communicate trade-offs clearly
I'm comfortable working in Agile teams and distributed environments
I prefer simple, maintainable solutions over over-engineering
